item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>It will be pre-LS. Probably the 10th but I need to confirm with a few people first.<br /><br />Of course you can always drink alone. But it's always better to drink with friends.</p>
item.content:encoded:
It will be pre-LS. Probably the 10th but I need to confirm with a few people first.

Of course you can always drink alone. But it’s always better to drink with friends.

item.title: By: Kerr
item.dc:creator: Kerr
item.description: <p>Is that pre or post LS?<br /><br />Do you think people will think I'm an alcy if I turn up and drink alone? ;)</p>
item.content:encoded:
Is that pre or post LS?

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Unfortunately my liver is feeling the effects of the last week or so, another week of the same could well kill it for good. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /><br /><br />There will be a get together in January so just get in training for that instead.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately my liver is feeling the effects of the last week or so, another week of the same could well kill it for good. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

There will be a get together in January so just get in training for that instead.

item.description: <p>Pah!! :(<br /><br />Without proper training my liver will not be able to cope with Christmas and new year.</p>
